name: Tyson Foods, Inc.
summary: Tyson Foods, Inc. is an American multinational corporation and the largest meat company in the United States, specializing in processing and marketing chicken, beef, and pork. Headquartered in Springdale, Arkansas, Tyson Foods operates globally with major brands such as Jimmy Dean and Hillshire Farm, and employs approximately 138,000 people. The company is publicly traded on the NYSE under the symbol TSN and consistently ranks among the top U.S. food producers.
